wordpressPost.title: Robyn will headline Friday 9th of August
wordpressPost.excerpt: We’ve had a very good start, and three headliners are already in place. The Cure and Norwegian duo Karpe have been announced in the last few weeks, and now we’re excited to day that we have Robyn confirmed. This will be her only festival show in Norway in 2019. All our tickets are on sale now.
wordpressPost.content:
ROBYN (SE)

It’s been eight years and now Robyn is finally back. The new successful album Honey was released in October and went straight to second place in the Norwegian charts. Robyn is a fantastic live artist, an industry-leading pioneer and a great inspiration for many.

She started her international pop career with songs like Do You Really Want Me (Show Respect) and Show Me Love in the mid 90’s.

Her self-titled album from 2005, showed a more mature musician. With songs like Be Mine, Who’s That Girl? and With Every Heartbeat she was in the charts all over the world. In 2010 she began a bold project releasing three EPs in a year. The Body Talk collection is packed with hits – and received great acclaim. In 2014, she collaborated with Röyksopp on the mini-album Do It Again. The following year she released an EP together with keyboardist Markus Jägerstedt and now deceased producer Christian Falk, using the name La Bagatelle Magique.

Now she is back with new songs and a fantastic liveshow.
